name: Small Heroes
description:
Hello Everybody, 

This is the Level 4 (No intro screen, no level end actions) from my new Platformer game Small Heroes.

Navigation is simple : Left,Up,Right keyboard arrows for movement and space for fire(If player collected weapon).

I started this game about 6 monthes ago. After all preparations (mechanics,objects,charactes e.t.c) I started to make levels.

Game have not yet Audio and Sfx. I did not make any intro and level selecting screens. For now I'm working only on level creation, new enemies ,new mechanics and bug fixes.

I would like to meet people, who can help me with new Ideas and Beta testing. I will be very appreciated if someone can spend his time to make this game Better !

Thank you !!!

Peter

Player graphics are  taken from https://pixel-frog.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1 for prototyping purposes and maybe will be changed in the future.
